Purdue University
S TAT ION W B A A
LAFAYETTE. INDIANA
January 6, 1956
Frank E. Schooley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Your letter of December 22nd arrived while I
WAS OUT OF TOWN. MY SECRETARY TELLS ME THAT NOTHING
WAS ENCLOSED WITH THE LETTER, HENCE I FIND IT A LITTLE
DIFFICULT TO REACT TO THE ENCLOSURE.
Trust this finds you started well with the new
YEAR.
S 1 NCERELY-,
Director, Radio Station WBAA
